bibl.title: Dura Europos 'Shield Map' and Expedition of Gordian III against the Persians.
bibl.note: The "Dura shield" [ed.: Franz Cumont, Fragment de bouclier portant une liste d'étapes, Syria 6 (1925) pp. 1-15 et pl. I] should probably be connected with the preparations and troop movements that preceded the Persian expedition of Gordian III.
bibl.seg: Gawroński Radosław A., Dura Europos 'Shield Map' and Expedition of Gordian III against the Persians.

The "Dura shield" [ed.: Franz Cumont, Fragment de bouclier portant une liste d'étapes, Syria 6 (1925) pp. 1-15 et pl. I] should probably be connected with the preparations and troop movements that preceded the Persian expedition of Gordian III.
